mapper.select: select id, platform, item_link, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_shop, shop_link, search_keyword, search_pages, status, created_at, updated_at from product where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into product(platform, item_link, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_shop, shop_link, search_keyword, search_pages, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{platform}, #{itemLink}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemImage}, #{itemShop}, #{shopLink}, #{searchKeyword}, #{searchPages}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

insert into product(platform, item_link, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_shop, shop_link, search_keyword, search_pages, status, created_at, updated_at) values
(#{entity.platform}, #{entity.itemLink}, #{entity.itemName}, #{entity.itemPrice}, #{entity.itemImage}, #{entity.itemShop}, #{entity.shopLink}, #{entity.searchKeyword}, #{entity.searchPages}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.updatedAt})

insert into product(platform, item_link, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_shop, shop_link, search_keyword, search_pages, status, created_at, updated_at) values
(#{entity.platform}, #{entity.itemLink}, #{entity.itemName}, #{entity.itemPrice}, #{entity.itemImage}, #{entity.itemShop}, #{entity.shopLink}, #{entity.searchKeyword}, #{entity.searchPages}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createdAt}, #{entity.updatedAt})
on duplicate key update platform = values(platform), item_link = values(item_link), item_name = values(item_name), item_price = values(item_price), item_image = values(item_image), item_shop = values(item_shop), shop_link = values(shop_link), search_keyword = values(search_keyword), search_pages = values(search_pages), status = values(status), created_at = values(created_at), updated_at = values(updated_at)
mapper.update:
update product
platform = #{platform},
item_link = #{itemLink},
item_name = #{itemName},
item_price = #{itemPrice},
item_image = #{itemImage},
item_shop = #{itemShop},
shop_link = #{shopLink},
search_keyword = #{searchKeyword},
search_pages = #{searchPages},
status = #{status},
created_at = #{createdAt},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
where id = #{id}
